Title: Quills
Actors: Geoffrey Rush, Kate Winslet, Joaquin Phoenix, Michael Caine
Plot: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 42 nominations.
Production: Hollywood Partners, Fox Searchlight, Walrus & Associates, Industry Entertainment
